name: Scallops Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, bay scallops, cilantro leaves, lime juice, olive oil, scallion, shellfish
recipeIngredient: 3 pounds bay scallops (or sea scallops, quartered)
1/2 cup fresh coriander leaves (or fresh parsley), chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Marinate scallops in lime juice for several hours in refrigerator, stirring occasionally.
Drain them, add remaining ingredients and mix thoroughly. Serve with bread, butter and plenty of toothpicks.
